channel.title: Git on Ramblings of a cloud engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Ramblings of a cloud engineer

item.title: Simple hook to rid of trouble
item.description: Hi folks. This is but a simple git hook to run a test in order to ensure you can push. It also ignores the vendor folder if you happen to have on in your directory. Edit the file under .git/hooks/pre-push.sample and add this at the end before the exit 0. go test $(go list ./... |grep -v vendor) RESULT=$? if [ $RESULT -ne 0 ]; then echo "Failed test run. Disallowing push.
